analysis.description:
TokenDestructible.destroy (/unique_chucks/35/0xe98296ee3e814beb3c8fba1e29a8a4287acec769.sol#161-174) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_chucks/35/0xe98296ee3e814beb3c8fba1e29a8a4287acec769.sol#172)

IndividualLockableToken.setReleaseTime (/unique_chucks/35/0xe98296ee3e814beb3c8fba1e29a8a4287acec769.sol#468-504) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_release_time >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/35/0xe98296ee3e814beb3c8fba1e29a8a4287acec769.sol#480-484)

IndividualLockableToken.getLockedBalance (/unique_chucks/35/0xe98296ee3e814beb3c8fba1e29a8a4287acec769.sol#674-696) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= userLock[_holder].release_time (/unique_chucks/35/0xe98296ee3e814beb3c8fba1e29a8a4287acec769.sol#680-690)

IndividualLockableToken.getFreeBalance (/unique_chucks/35/0xe98296ee3e814beb3c8fba1e29a8a4287acec769.sol#704-728) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= userLock[_holder].release_time (/unique_chucks/35/0xe98296ee3e814beb3c8fba1e29a8a4287acec769.sol#712-718)
IndividualLockableToken.lock_period should be constant (/unique_chucks/35/0xe98296ee3e814beb3c8fba1e29a8a4287acec769.sol#454-458)
Ownable.renounceOwnership (/unique_chucks/35/0xe98296ee3e814beb3c8fba1e29a8a4287acec769.sol#83-88) should be declared external
